subject: Check your eligibility to finance your Howdens products

rows.text: Howdens have partnered with Kanda to allow you to apply for finance for your Howdens  products. Before you can apply for finance you'll need to first check if you're eligible. Click below to complete a short eligibility checker and set your budget.

body.text: Key Features of Paying with Finance:

rows.subtext: Spread the cost of your kitchen with a fixed interest rate of 12.9% APR, subject to eligibility.
Borrow up to 100% of the kitchen cost or pay a deposit, depending on your preference.
Start repayments 30 days after your initial kitchen delivery.

Make additional payments at any time without penalty to reduce your loan balance and interest.
Settle your loan early with no extra fees, ensuring flexibility for your circumstances.
Enjoy equal liability protection under the Consumer Credit Act for added peace of mind.
For finance queries please email Kanda at support@kanda.co.uk or call us on 0330 808 3911. For order queries, please email {{extras.branch.contact_email}} or call {{extras.branch.contact_phone}}.
